mapper.insert: insert into training_class (class_name, class_name_py, class_begin_time, location, teacher_name, content, status, max_participant_count) values (#{className}, #{classNamePY}, #{classBeginTime}, #{location}, #{teacherName}, #{content}, #{status}, #{maxParticipantCount})
mapper.update:
update training_class
class_name = #{className},
class_name_py = #{classNamePY},
class_begin_time = #{classBeginTime},
location = #{location},
teacher_name = #{teacherName},
content = #{content},
status = #{status},
max_participant_count = #{maxParticipantCount},
where class_id = #{classId}
mapper.select: select a.class_id AS classId, a.class_name AS className, a.class_name_py AS classNamePy, a.class_begin_time AS classBeginTime, a.location, a.teacher_name AS teacherName, a.content, a.status, a.max_participant_count AS maxParticipantCount, (select count(*) from training_sign_up b where b.class_id = a.class_id and b.status = '1') AS signUpCount from training_class a where a.class_id = #{classId}
